headerText:
The sparkline component can be used to create simple graphs, like GitHub's contribution chart.

Any [SVG attribute](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/SVG/Attribute) may be used in addition to the ones listed below.

playground.desc: The sparkline component comes in 2 variations, **trend**(default) and **bar**. Each support a multitude of options for customizing the look and feel of the sparkline.

heartRate.desc: For concise information, a complete chart might be overkill. Using a trend line with gradient provides enough detail for the user without showing too much information.

props.autoDraw: Trace the length of the line when first rendered
props.autoDrawDuration: Amount of time (in ms) to run the trace animation
props.autoDrawEasing: The easing function to use for the trace animation
props.gradient: An array of colors to use as a linear-gradient
props.gradientDirection: The direction the gradient should run
props.lineWidth: The thickness of the line, in px
props.padding: Low `smooth` or high `line-width` values may result in cropping, increase padding to compensate
props.showLabel: Show labels below each data point
props.smooth: Number of px to use as a corner radius. `true` defaults to 8, `false` is 0
props.type: Choose between a trendline or bars
